title: 7 from Mass. charged in alleged kidnapping and torture plot
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Five of the alleged kidnappers are in custody, and two remain at large.

title: Golden retriever puppies with potentially deadly virus found abandoned in Boston
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News One of the dogs, named Big Red, will be up for adoption once the virus and gastrointestinal parasites clear his system.
Big Red during his hospitalization.
MSPCA-Angell MSPCA-Angell is advising owners to vaccinate their dogs after golden retriever puppies with a potentially deadly disease were found abandoned in Boston.
